skill.name: lead-research-assistant
skill.description: Identifies high-quality leads for your product or service by analyzing your business, searching for target companies, and providing actionable contact strategies. Perfect for sales, business development, and marketing professionals.
skill.summary: Identifies high-quality leads for your product or service by analyzing your business, searching for ...
skill.author: Joseph OBrien

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill containing only documentation and markdown templates. No executable code, scripts, network calls, filesystem access, or command execution capabilities detected.

content.value_statement: Finding qualified leads takes hours of manual research. This skill analyzes your business, identifies matching companies, and provides personalized contact strategies so you can focus on outreach instead of research.
actual_capabilities: Analyze your product or service to understand value proposition
Identify target companies matching your ideal customer profile
Score and prioritize leads based on fit and relevance
Research decision-makers and gather contact context
Provide personalized outreach strategies for each lead
limitations: Does not access real-time company databases or APIs
Cannot verify current contact information accuracy
Cannot send emails or make calls directly
Results depend on information you provide and AI knowledge

use_cases.title: Build prospect lists
use_cases.description: Generate qualified lists of companies that match your ideal customer profile with prioritized contact strategies.

use_cases.title: Find partnership targets
use_cases.description: Identify companies for strategic partnerships by analyzing complementary products and market fit.

use_cases.title: Launch go-to-market
use_cases.description: Quickly build initial outreach lists when entering new markets or launching new products.

prompt_templates.title: Quick lead search
prompt_templates.prompt: I sell [product description]. Find me 10 companies in [location/industry] that would benefit from this.

prompt_templates.title: Analyze codebase
prompt_templates.prompt: Look at what I am building in this repository and identify the top 10 companies in [location] that would benefit from this product.

prompt_templates.title: Detailed profile
prompt_templates.prompt: My product: [description]. Target: [industry], [size], [location]. Find 20 qualified leads with specific contact strategies.

prompt_templates.title: Competitive analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: My product competes with [competitor]. Identify their customers who would benefit from switching to my solution.

output_examples.input: I sell a data masking tool for AI coding assistants. Find me 10 fintech companies that use AI coding tools.
output: Company A - Priority 9/10 - Uses Copilot and Claude - Has exposed data in public repos
Company B - Priority 8/10 - Healthcare fintech with strict compliance needs
Company C - Priority 7/10 - Growing startup with AI-first engineering culture

best_practices: Provide specific industry, location, and company size criteria for better results
Run the skill from your codebase directory when applicable for automatic context
Ask for follow-up research on top-ranked leads to deepen qualification
anti_patterns: Vague product descriptions that lack clear value proposition
Missing target market constraints leading to irrelevant results
Skipping the fit score review and going straight to outreach

faq.question: What AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. All versions support the full lead research workflow.

faq.question: How many leads can I find at once?
faq.answer: The skill can handle requests for 10-50 leads depending on specificity. More detailed criteria produces better results.

faq.question: Can I integrate with my CRM?
faq.answer: The skill can format results as CSV for easy import into CRM tools like Salesforce or HubSpot.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. This is a prompt-based skill with no code execution. No data leaves your session except what you share.

faq.question: Why are some leads missing contact info?
faq.answer: The skill provides guidance based on available context. For verified contact data, combine with dedicated enrichment tools.

faq.question: How is this different from paid lead databases?
faq.answer: This skill uses AI reasoning to find and qualify leads without subscription costs. Accuracy depends on provided criteria.
